  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La dansa a l'escola</string>
            <string language="en">Dancing at school</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tanzen an der Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Danser à l'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dançar na escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ballando alla scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χορός στο σχολείο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs informatiu sobre la dansa popular a Catalunya i un recull de danses populars. Conté una justificació didàctica sobre la pràctica de la dansa a l'escola i presenta dos projectes amb coreografia i arxius de so: "La cançó més bonica" i "Dels arbres".</string>
            <string language="en">Information on country dancing in Catalonia, and a selection of some of the dances. It includes didactic reasons for teaching dancing in school and presents two projects with choreography and audio files (.wav): "The Prettiest Dance" and "Trees".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">dansa</string>
            <string language="en">dance</string>
            <string language="es">danza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über das Land, das in Katalonien 
tanzt, und eine Auswahl von einigen der Tänze. Es schließt 
didaktische Gründe für das unterrichtende Tanzen in der Schule ein 
und stellt zwei Projekte mit choreography und Audiodateien dar (wav): 
"der hübschste Tanz" und "Bäume".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur le pays dansant en Catalogne, et 
une sélection de certaines des danses. Elle inclut des raisons 
didactiques de danser d'enseignement à l'école et présente deux 
projets avec la chorégraphie et les fichiers sonores (wav) : "la 
plus jolie danse" et "arbres".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação no país que dança em Catalonia, e 
uma seleção de algumas das danças. Inclui razões didactic 
para dançar ensinando na escola e apresenta dois projetos com 
choreography e as limas audio (wav): "a dança a mais bonita" e 
"árvores".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sul paese che balla in Catalogna e 
una selezione di alcuni dei balli. Include i motivi didattici 
per ballare d'istruzione a scuola e presenta i due progetti con il 
choreography e gli archivi audio (wav): "il ballo più grazioso"
e "alberi".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για το χορό χωρών στην Καταλωνία, και μια 
επιλογή μερικοί από τους χορούς. Περιλαμβάνει τους 
διδακτικούς λόγους για τη διδασκαλία χορεύοντας στο σχολείο και 
παρουσιάζει δύο προγράμματα με τη χορογραφία και τα ηχητικά 
αρχεία (ωαβ): "Ο χορός Prettiest" και "δέντρα".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">danse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dança</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ballo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χορός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
